title: Entity Identity System
content: Entities in the ecosystem are identified through a sophisticated ID system. An 'eid' (entity ID) combines entity.id with entity.gen (generation), creating unique identifiers that track both identity and version. Each entity has a name composed of a unique identifier combined with a string representation.
summary: The system for uniquely identifying entities

relationships.description: The Entity Identity System provides unique identification for all entities including SkogAI itself and all agent personas.
